subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: None of the pitches Daisuke Matsuzaka threw were harder than 91 m.p.h., allowing Torii Hunter and Miguel Cabrera to hit towering home runs in the Tigers win over the Mets.
snippet: None of the pitches Daisuke Matsuzaka threw were harder than 91 m.p.h., allowing Torii Hunter and Miguel Cabrera to hit towering home runs in the Tigers win over the Mets.
